mapper.select: call rd_data.sp_broadcast_room_list(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.sql:
select *, @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 as rowNum from ( select prof.image_profile as image_profile , bro.badge_recomm as badge_recomm , bro.badge_popular as badge_popular , bro.badge_newdj as badge_newdj , mem.mem_id as mem_id , mem.mem_nick as mem_nick , bro.count_entry as count_entry , (select sum(ifnull(money,0)) from rd_data.tb_member_wallet where mem_no = mem.mem_no) as money , (select count(if(gifted_mem_no!=0, gifted_mem_no, null)) from rd_data.tb_member_broadcast_item where mem_no = mem.mem_no) as gifted_mem_no , (select count(if(mem_no!=0, mem_no, null)) from rd_data.tb_member_broadcast_broadcasting where mem_no = mem.mem_no) as airCount , (select min(start_date) from rd_data.tb_member_broadcast_broadcasting where mem_no = mem.mem_no) as start_date , (select sum(ifnull(airtime,0)) from rd_data.tb_member_broadcast_broadcasting where mem_no = mem.mem_no) as airTime , bro.subject_type as subject_type , (select ifnull(sum(ifnull(gold, 0)), 0) from rd_data.tb_member_broadcast_item where room_no = bro.room_no and item_type = 1) as byeol , (select sum(ifnull(count_good,0)) from rd_data.tb_broadcast_room where mem_no = mem.mem_no) as count_good from rd_data.tb_member_basic mem , rd_data.tb_member_profile prof , rd_data.tb_broadcast_room bro where mem.mem_no = prof.mem_no and bro.mem_no = mem.mem_no and bro.state < 4
and subject_type = #{subject_type}
and badge_newdj = 1
and mem_id like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%')
and mem_nick like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%')
and mem.mem_phone like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%')
and mem.mem_name like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%')
and (mem_id like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%') or mem_nick like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%') or mem.mem_phone like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%') or mem.mem_name like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%'))
group by mem.mem_no ) a , (select @RNUM := 0) r order by
a.count_entry desc, a.byeol desc, a.start_date asc
a.byeol desc, a.count_entry desc, a.start_date asc
a.count_entry desc, a.byeol desc, a.start_date asc
a.count_entry desc, a.count_good desc, a.start_date asc
